RelatedSentence: Once better maps started to appear , the idea that there might be an earlier volcano came to our minds , Sinton said .
Sinton and his colleagues distinguished the volcanoes with analysis of rock samples and detailed mapping of the seafloor 's bumps and saddles .
The lava at each volcano is chemically distinct , with different ages ; gravity surveys suggest the different groups of lava had unique sources .

Ka'ena volcano fixes the chain 's missing link .
But there 's one mystery Ka'ena volcano ca n't solve .
Despite an intense search , the research team never found the source of an enigmatic underwater eruption in 1956 offshore of Oahu , Sinton said .
